#comment: The following are CMOR internal settings and should not be edited by the user
grid: data regridded to a 0.5x0.5 deg latxlon grid from the native EASE2 25 km polar grids
license: Data in this file is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/).
title: Monthly Sea Ice Concentration Climate Data Record Version 3 from the EUMETSAT OSI SAF, with R&D input from ESA CCI, prepared for obs4MIPS by MET Norway
summary: This climate data record of sea ice concentration is obtained from coarse resolution passive microwave satellite data (SMMR, SSM/I, and SSMIS) over the polar regions (Arctic and Antarctic). The processing chain features: 1) dynamic tuning of tie-points and algorithms,  2) correction of atmospheric noise using a Radiative Transfer Model,  3) computation of per-pixel uncertainties, and 4) an optimal hybrid sea ice concentration algorithm. This dataset was generated by the EUMETSAT Ocean and Sea Ice Satellite Application Facility (OSI SAF). The ESA CCI Programme contributed with Research and Development on the algorithms. MET Norway prepare the data for obs4MIPS.
keywords: GCMDSK:Earth Science > Cryosphere > Sea Ice > Sea Ice Concentration, GCMDSK:Earth Science > Oceans > Sea Ice > Sea Ice Concentration, GCMDSK:Earth Science > Climate Indicators > Cryospheric Indicators > Sea Ice Concentration, GCMDLOC:Geographic Region > Global Ocean, GCMDLOC:Vertical Location > Sea Surface, GCMDPROV: Government Agencies-non-US > Norway > NO/MET > Norwegian Meteorological Institute
contributor_name: Thomas Lavergne,Atle Soerensen,Rasmus Tonboe,Courtenay Strong,Matilde Kreiner,Roberto Saldo,Anton Birkedal,Fabrizio Baordo,Trygve Aspenes,Steinar Eastwood
